column1: When the observer lived here it was a school and he was the headmaster. He had 2 gauges, one on the lawn, the other in a viewing tower built by the previous owner.
It is currently a hotel 250 yrds N of station. Elevation changed as 140ft too high
1877 This gauge is place experimentally on a tower 14ft above the other gauge and quite clear of trees
1877 The total registered by this gauge during the 5 months is 11.46 and by the old gauge 15.04 for the same period
